- @dunn2018generalized is a recent textbook on GLMs. It doesn't cover time-to-event models, and it doesn't use the modern [`tidyverse`](https://tidyverse.org/) packages ([`ggplot2`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/), [`dplyr`](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/), etc.), but otherwise it seems great.

- @moore2016applied is a recent textbook on survival analysis. It also doesn't use the `tidyverse`, but otherwise seems great.
